definitions.definition: a person who has been trained in the science of animal medicine, whose job is to treat animals who are sick or injured
definitions.labels: (especially British English)North American English usuallyalso British English, formal

examples.text: We had to take the dog to the local vet.

definitions.definition: the place where a vet works

examples.text: I've got to take the dog to the vet's tomorrow.

definitions.definition: a person who has been a soldier, sailor, etc. in a war
definitions.labels: (North American English, informal)British and North American English

wordOrigin: noun senses 1 to 2 mid 19th cent: abbreviation of veterinary or veterinarian. noun sense 3 mid 19th cent.: abbreviation.
